original_text: Do not admit a charge against an elder except on the evidence of two or three witnesses.
korean_text: 장로에 대한 고발은 두세 증인이 없으면 받지 말 것이요

sentences.original_text: Do not admit a charge against an elder
except on the evidence of two or three witnesses.
sentences.korean_translation: 단, 두세 증인의 증거가 있을 때는.
